description: Simple apache container for the user to test their vpn connection

flag_1.description: This flag is obtained by simply accessing the webpage of the container ([! container_ip !]).
hints: Maybe you need to connect to the networks vpn first?
Connect to the network with openvpn, then access the container in your webbrowser (http://[! container_ip !]).
Copy the flag and redeem it at the redeem flag form.
